properties.entry: INSERT INTO target_trak_dw.contact (contact_type, title, first_name, last_name, middle_initial, suffix, telephone_number, email_address, company_id, active_at_company, created_by, created_ts, last_updated_by, last_updated_ts) VALUES (:contactType, :title, :firstName, :lastName, :middleInitial, :suffix, :telephoneNumber, :emailAddress, :companyId, :activeAtCompany, :createdBy, :createdTs, :lastUpdatedBy, :lastUpdatedTs)

SELECT id, contact_type, title, first_name, last_name, middle_initial, suffix, telephone_number, email_address, company_id, active_at_company, created_by, created_ts, last_updated_by, last_updated_ts FROM target_trak_dw.contact WHERE id = :id

SELECT id, contact_type, title, first_name, last_name, middle_initial, suffix, telephone_number, email_address, company_id, active_at_company, created_by, created_ts, last_updated_by, last_updated_ts FROM target_trak_dw.contact WHERE 1 = 1

UPDATE target_trak_dw.contact SET contact_type = :contactType, title = :title, last_name = :lastName, telephone_number = :telephoneNumber, email_address = :emailAddress, active_at_company = :activeAtCompany, last_updated_by = :lastUpdatedBy, last_updated_ts = :lastUpdatedTs WHERE id = :id
